mapper.select:
SELECT bmdd as bmdd, sum( llkmzkykrs ) as llkmzkykrs, sum( llkmzkskrs ) as llkmzkskrs, sum( llkmhgrs ) as llkmhgrs, round( sum( llkmhgrs ) / sum( llkmzkskrs ), 4 ) as llhgl, sum( ll7879 ) as ll7879, sum( yynlzkykrs ) as yynlzkykrs, sum(yynlzskrs) as yynlzskrs, sum( yynlhgrs ) as yynlhgrs, round( sum( yynlhgrs ) / sum( yynlzskrs ), 4 ) as yyhgl, sum( yynl7879 ) as yynl7879, sum( ykrs ) as ykrs, sum( ksrs ) as ksrs, sum( tgrs ) as tgrs, sum( bmrs ) as bmrs, sum( yzkrs ) as yzkrs, sum( llbkrs ) as llbkrs , sum( scbkrs ) as scbkrs, sum( llbkrs)+ sum(scbkrs ) as bkrs, sum(bkhgrs) as bkhgrs, sum( llbkrs)+ sum(scbkrs )-sum(bkhgrs) as bkbhgrs FROM ( SELECT Y.YKRS, LLKMZKYKRS.LLKMZKYKRS, LLKMZKSKRS.LLKMZKSKRS, LL7879.LL7879, LLKMHGRS.LLKMHGRS, YYNLZKYKRS.YYNLZKYKRS, YYNLZSKRS.YYNLZSKRS, YYNL7879.YYNL7879, YYNLHGRS.YYNLHGRS, YY.KSRS, YYY.TGRS, BM.BMRS, YZKRS.YZKRS, LLBKRS.LLBKRS, SCBKRS.SCBKRS, BKHGRS.BKHGRS, CASE SUBSTR( Y.SLDWQX, LENGTH( Y.SLDWQX ), 1 ) WHEN 'åŒº' THEN SUBSTR( Y.SLDWQX, 1, LENGTH( Y.SLDWQX ) - 1 ) ELSE Y.SLDWQX END BMDD FROM ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ISJF = '1' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) Y LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS LLKMZKYKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ISJF = '1' AND A.KM = 1 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) LLKMZKYKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = LLKMZKYKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS LLKMZKSKRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ != '-1' AND A.KM = 1 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) LLKMZKSKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = LLKMZKSKRS.SLDWQX
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS LL7879 FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ >= '78' AND A.Cj <= '79' AND A.KM = 1 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) LL7879 ON Y.SLDWQX = LL7879.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS LLKMHGRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ >= '80' AND A.KM = 1 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) LLKMHGRS ON Y.SLDWQX = LLKMHGRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YYNLZKYKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ISJF = '1' AND A.KM = 2 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YYNLZKYKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = YYNLZKYKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YYNLZSKRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ != '-1' AND A.KM = 2 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YYNLZSKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = YYNLZSKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YYNLHGRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJHZ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ >= '80' AND A.KM = 2 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YYNLHGRS ON Y.SLDWQX = YYNLHGRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YYNL7879 FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJHZ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ >= '78' AND A.CJ <= '79' AND A.KM = 2 ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YYNL7879 ON Y.SLDWQX = YYNL7879.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS KSRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_CJ A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.CJ != '-1' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YY ON Y.SLDWQX = YY.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS TGRS FROM ( SELECT A.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_HG_HGRY A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( A.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.FLAG = '1' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YYY ON Y.SLDWQX = YYY.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS BMRS FROM ( SELECT B.PSN, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_B_BM B WHERE TO_CHAR( B.SLTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND B.FLAG != '0' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) BM ON Y.SLDWQX = BM.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS YZKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.ISJF = '1' AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ZKBK = '1' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) YZKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = YZKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS LLBKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.ISJF = '1' AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ZKBK = '2' AND A.KM = '1' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) LLBKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = LLBKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS SCBKRS FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.SLDWQX FROM DL_KS_YK A LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON A.BMID = B.BMID WHERE TO_CHAR( A.CZTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND A.ISJF = '1' AND A.FLAG = '1' AND A.ZKBK = '2' AND A.KM = '3' ) T GROUP BY T.SLDWQX ) SCBKRS ON Y.SLDWQX = SCBKRS.SLDWQX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.SLDWQX, COUNT( DISTINCT T.PSN ) AS BKHGRS FROM DL_HG_HGRY T LEFT JOIN DL_KS_YK YK ON T.PSN=YK.PSN LEFT JOIN DL_B_BM B ON T.PSN = B.PSN WHERE TO_CHAR( T.SCTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{starttime} AND #{endtime} AND T.FLAG = '1' AND YK.ZKBK=2 GROUP BY B.SLDWQX ) BKHGRS ON Y.SLDWQX = BKHGRS.SLDWQX ) RES GROUP BY RES.BMDD ORDER BY RES.BMDD
